name: Robocrak
description:
In this game you control a robot and have to avoid the webs.

Controls

The controls are very easy. The only thing you have to now is that you go up with the space bar or with the left mouse button. To go down you have to by over the "Down Zone" and have to have a "Down Coin", when you have all of this you have to press the jump button.

Game Jam

This game was made in 72 hours for the Game Jam "Mini Jam 123: Web".

But now have a good time with this game.
